EmailTemplate.subject: How to Optimize Your VMware ELA
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-vmware-ela/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4hbAAA]]>
Register Now and Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-vmware-ela/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4hbAAA]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, You're invited to join our How to Optimize Your VMware ELA Webinar <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-vmware-ela/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4hbAAA]]> on Wednesday, December 19th at 11 a.m. ET, as Eric Wright, Director of Technical Marketing, shares how hundreds of VMware customers leverage Turbonomic to optimize their VMware ELA.
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-vmware-ela/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4hbAAA]]>
In this live 30-minute webinar <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-vmware-ela/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4hbAAA]]>, you will find out:
- Key capabilities and value of the VMware Portfolio - How to evaluate your cloud migration and investment alongside your VMware ELA - How to optimize your VMware investments and significantly shrink your VMware ELA
All registered guests will be entered to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card. I hope to see you there! Regards, Andrew P.S. Ready to see what Workload Automation can do for you? Download Turbonomic for 30 days free <[[https://turbonomic.com/downloads/turbonomic-30-day-trial/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4hgAAA]]>.
